   20: %%
   21: 
   22: -module(openssl_sni_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: %% Callback functions
   26: -export([all/0,
   27:          groups/0,
   28:          init_per_suite/1,
   29:          end_per_suite/1,
   30:          init_per_group/2,
   31:          end_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2,
   33:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   34: 
   35: %% Testcases
   36: -export([sni_match/1,
   37:          sni_match_fun/1,
   38:          sni_no_match/1,
   39:          sni_no_match_fun/1,
   40:          sni_no_header/1,
   41:          sni_no_header_fun/1
   42:         ]).
   43: 
   44: %% Apply exports
   45: -export([send_and_hostname/1
   46:         ]).
   47: 
   48: -define(OPENSSL_QUIT, "Q\n").
   49: -define(OPENSSL_RENEGOTIATE, "R\n").
   50: -define(SLEEP, 1000).
   51: 
   52: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   53: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   54: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   55: 
   56: all() -> 
   57:     %% Note: SNI not supported in sslv3
   58:     case ssl_test_lib:openssl_sane_dtls() of 
   59:         true ->
   60:             [{group, 'tlsv1.3'},
   61:              {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   62:              {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   63:              {group, 'tlsv1'},
   64:              {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
   65:              {group, 'dtlsv1'}
   66:             ];
   67:         false ->
   68:             [{group, 'tlsv1.3'},
   69:              {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   70:              {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   71:              {group, 'tlsv1'}]
   72:     end.
   73: 
   74: groups() ->
   75:      case ssl_test_lib:openssl_sane_dtls() of 
   76:          true ->
   77:              [{'tlsv1.3', [], sni_tests()},
   78:               {'tlsv1.2', [], sni_tests()},
   79:               {'tlsv1.1', [], sni_tests()},
   80:               {'tlsv1', [], sni_tests()},
   81:               {'dtlsv1.2', [], sni_tests()},
   82:               {'dtlsv1', [], sni_tests()}
   83:              ];
   84:         false ->
   85:              [{'tlsv1.3', [], sni_tests()},
   86:               {'tlsv1.2', [], sni_tests()},
   87:               {'tlsv1.1', [], sni_tests()},
   88:               {'tlsv1', [], sni_tests()}
   89:              ]
   90:      end.
   91:  
   92: sni_tests() ->
   93:     [sni_match,
   94:      sni_match_fun,
   95:      sni_no_match,
   96:      sni_no_match_fun,
   97:      sni_no_header,
   98:      sni_no_header_fun].
   99: 
  100: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  101:     Config1 = ssl_test_lib:init_per_suite(Config0, openssl),
  102:     Config2 = check_openssl_sni_support(Config1),
  103:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config2),
  104:     Hostname = net_adm:localhost(),
  105:     {#{server_config := ServerConf,
  106:        client_config := ClientConf},
  107:      #{server_config := LServerConf,
  108:        client_config := LClientConf}} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_sni_configs(),
  109:     [{client_opts, ClientConf}, {client_local_opts, LClientConf},
  110:      {sni_server_opts, [{sni_hosts, [{Hostname, ServerConf}]} | LServerConf]} | Config].
  111: 
  112: 
  113: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  114:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_suite(Config).
  115: 
  116: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  117:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group_openssl(GroupName, Config).
  118: 
  119: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  120:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  121: 
  122: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) -> 
  123:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  124:     Config.
  125: 
  126: 
  127: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  128:     Config.
  129: 
  130: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  131: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  132: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  133: sni_no_header(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  134:     {_, ServerNode, _} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  135:     ServerOptions = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config), Config),
  136:     ClientOptions = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, disable} |
  137:                                               proplists:get_value(client_local_opts, Config)], Config),
  138:     case proplists:get_value(openssl_disable, Config) of
  139:         true ->
  140:             sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientOptions, Config);
  141:         false ->
  142:             {skip, no_openssl_sni_disable_flag}
  143:     end.
  144: 
  145: sni_no_header_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  146:     {_, ServerNode, _} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  147:     [{sni_hosts, ServerSNIConf}| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  148:     SNIFun = fun(Domain) -> proplists:get_value(Domain, ServerSNIConf, []) end,
  149:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config) ++ [{sni_fun, SNIFun}],
  150:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, disable} |
  151:                                                proplists:get_value(client_local_opts, Config)], Config),
  152:     case proplists:get_value(openssl_disable, Config) of
  153:         true ->
  154:             sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientOptions, Config);
  155:         false ->
  156:             {skip, no_openssl_sni_disable_flag}
  157:     end.
  158: 
  159: sni_match(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  160:     {_, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  161:     ServerOptions = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config), Config),
  162:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  163:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  164:     sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientOptions, Config).
  165: 
  166: sni_match_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  167:     {_, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  168:     [{sni_hosts, ServerSNIConf}| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  169:     SNIFun = fun(Domain) -> proplists:get_value(Domain, ServerSNIConf, undefined) end,
  170:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config) ++ [{sni_fun, SNIFun}],
  171:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  172:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  173:     sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientOptions, Config).
  174: 
  175: sni_no_match(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  176:     {_, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  177:     [_ | DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  178:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  179:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  180:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config),
  181:     sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientOptions, Config).
  182: 
  183: sni_no_match_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  184:     {_, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  185:     [{sni_hosts, _}| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  186:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config),
  187:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  188:                                                proplists:get_value(client_local_opts, Config)], Config),
  189:     sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientOptions, Config).
  190: 
  191: 
  192: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  193: %% Callback functions  ------------------------------------------------
  194: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  195: send_and_hostname(SSLSocket) ->
  196:     ssl:send(SSLSocket, "OK"),
  197:     case ssl:connection_information(SSLSocket, [sni_hostname]) of
  198: 	{ok, []} ->
  199: 	    undefined;
  200: 	{ok, [{sni_hostname, Hostname}]} ->
  201: 	    Hostname
  202:     end.
  203: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  204: %% Internal functions  -----------------------------------------------
  205: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  206: sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions0, ClientOptions, Config) ->
  207:     %% Test Erlang server SNI handling with OpenSSL client
  208:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  209:     ServerOptions = maybe_add_sigalgs(Version, ServerOptions0),
  210: 
  211: 
  212:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  213:                                         {from, self()}, {mfa, {?MODULE, send_and_hostname, []}},
  214:                                         {options, ServerOptions}]),
  215:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  216: 
  217:     SNIHostname = case proplists:get_value(server_name_indication, ClientOptions) of
  218:                       disable ->
  219:                           undefined;
  220:                       Name ->
  221:                           Name
  222:                   end,
  223: 
  224:     Sigalgs = maybe_add_openssl_sigalgs(Version),
  225:     ClientPort = ssl_test_lib:start_client(openssl, 
  226:                                            Sigalgs ++ [{port, Port}, 
  227:                                                        {server_name, SNIHostname} | 
  228:                                                                 ClientOptions], 
  229:                                            Config),
  230:   
  231:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, SNIHostname),
  232:     ssl_test_lib:close_port(ClientPort),
  233:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  234:     ok.
  235: 
  236: maybe_add_sigalgs(Version, ServerOptions) when Version == 'tlsv1.3';
  237:                                                Version == 'tlsv1.2' ->
  238:     case maybe_add_openssl_sigalgs(Version) of
  239:         [] ->
  240:             [{signature_algs, [rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,
  241:                                rsa_pss_rsae_sha384,
  242:                                rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
  243:                                {sha512, rsa},
  244:                                {sha384, rsa},
  245:                                {sha256, rsa},
  246:                                {sha224, rsa},
  247:                                {sha, rsa}
  248:                               ]
  249:              } | ServerOptions];
  250:         _ ->
  251:             [{signature_algs, [rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,
  252:                                rsa_pss_rsae_sha384,
  253:                                rsa_pss_rsae_sha256]} | ServerOptions]
  254:     end;
  255: maybe_add_sigalgs(_, ServerOptions) ->
  256:     ServerOptions.
  257: 
  258: maybe_add_openssl_sigalgs(Version) when Version == 'tlsv1.3';
  259:                                         Version == 'tlsv1.2' ->
  260:     case ssl_test_lib:portable_cmd("openssl", ["version"]) of
  261:         "OpenSSL 1.0" ++  _ ->
  262:             [];
  263:         _ ->
  264:             HelpText = ssl_test_lib:portable_cmd("openssl", ["s_client", "--help"]),
  265:             case string:str(HelpText, "-sigalgs") of
  266:                 0 ->
  267:                     [];
  268:                 _ ->
  269:                     [{sigalgs, "rsa_pss_rsae_sha512:rsa_pss_rsae_sha384:rsa_pss_rsae_sha256"}]
  270:             end
  271:     end;
  272: maybe_add_openssl_sigalgs(_) ->
  273:     [].
  274: 
  275: check_openssl_sni_support(Config) ->
  276:     HelpText = ssl_test_lib:portable_cmd("openssl", ["s_client", "--help"]),
  277:     case string:str(HelpText, "-servername") of
  278:         0 ->
  279:             throw({skip, "Current openssl doesn't support SNI"});
  280:         _ ->
  281:             case string:str(HelpText, "-noservername") of
  282:                 0 ->
  283:                     [{openssl_disable, false} | Config];
  284:                 _ ->
  285:                     [{openssl_disable, true} | Config]
  286:             end
  287:     end.
